body_html:
I know, it means cpu version still need the cuda to install.
I shouldn't installed cuda7 in my anaconda before I installed pytorch.
It works after I uninstall the origin cuda and run 'conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch' again
Thanks for everybody.

body:
I know, it means cpu version still need the cuda to install.
I shouldn't installed cuda7 in my anaconda before I installed pytorch.
It works after I uninstall the origin cuda and run 'conda install pytorch torchvision -c pytorch' again
Thanks for everybody.
